quote: "Get rid of anger and painful memories quickly and painlessly for good, so that you would discover a good well-being and have more energy to do what is important in life!"
about_me:
Hello!

I am Monika, I used to feel rejected, unrecognized by my father. Inside, I held onto suppressed painful memories and anger towards him. As a result, I became irritable, small things triggered my anger, and I attracted people and situations into my life where I asked, "Why is this happening to me?".

One day I realized that I needed to find a way to forgive him and free myself from the pain and resentment towards my father because that anger was destroying my relationship with myself, with loved ones, and draining my positive feelings and energy.

When I felt gratitude with tears in my eyes towards my father for what I held anger about, seeing the meaning of events, I unconditionally accepted him. At the same time, I also accepted myself, freeing myself from the injustice of pain, anger, blame, guilt. Instead, understanding emerged that everything has a purpose, that things happen because of me, and I am the one creating my life. More feelings of well-being and energy emerged to do what is important in life.

To this day, it helps me accept myself, other people, and create meaningful relationships. Situations that raised the question "why me?" disappeared from my life. I feel a spiritual luxuryâ€”harmony and inspiration like never before in my life.
about_me_extra_text: Therefore, today I feel called to share with you my skills, methods, and tools so that you can experience how a person can feel and have a sense of well-being and energy by getting rid of what weighs them down.
products_p1: I believe that success in your life can be discovered through a program called A NEW WAY TO LOVE - it is a unique, 100% effective, and scientifically based system that will help you eliminate anger, painful memories from the past forever, and have more energy to do what matters in life.
products_p2: This system is unique and effective because I use the following steps:
products_p3: - Based on the principle of BALANCE, which states that everything in life has opposing sides: heat-cold, day-night, plus-minus, etc. We restore your PERCEPTION TO BALANCE during that event. That is, we add the positive side to the negative event, finding how that painful event was as beneficial to you as it was harmful, what benefit it has given you from then until now.
products_p4: By recognizing the hidden dynamics and meaning of events that you hadn't seen before, understanding that the event was equally harmful to you, feeling gratitude and an open-hearted feeling, there is no room for blame, only a desire to express gratitude for that experience.
products_p5: - Only by balancing your ANTI-MEMORY (according to Oxford University scientists - every emotionally charged event has a stuck fantasy, and how I wanted it to be) will you free yourself from emotions and painful memories forever and discover the hidden gift for you - a good sense of well-being and energy.
products_p6: Many people have already tried this program and are delighted with the results.
products_p7: Join in, because living with it throughout your life is much harder, it takes away energy, health, and damages the relationship with yourself and your loved ones.
products_p8: Working with your mind, you will feel an increase in energy and a positive change in your body after the first session, while the most significant external changes will be noticeable after 3 months.
packages_sum_1_1: Now is the best time to experience the breakthrough in your life!
packages_sum_1_2: Find the key to mastering your mind & life to have greater freedom, balance, and inspiration.
packages_sum_1_3: 2 nights, and 3 days of one-to-one personal sessions with you at your private transformational retreat.
packages_sum_1_4: The sessions will take place in the restaurant and your room.
